metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5072 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Denial of Service in JSON-Java versions up to and including 20230618. A bug in the parser means that an input string of modest size can lead to indefinite amounts of memory being used.

criterions.comment: jenkins-json: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libjettison-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libjson-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
